mapper.select: select r.no, user_no userNo, title, content, hit, to_char(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') regDate, u.name userName, group_no groupNo, order_no orderNo, depth from users u, rboard r where u.no= r.user_no order by groupNo desc, orderNo asc, depth desc

select r.no, user_no userNo, title, content, hit, to_char(reg_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') regDate, u.name userName, group_no groupNo, order_no orderNo, depth from users u, rboard r where u.no= r.user_no and r.no= #{no}
mapper.insert: insert into rboard values (seq_rboard_no.nextval, #{userNo}, #{title}, #{content}, 0, sysdate, seq_group_no.nextval, 1, 0)
